body_html: I also don't know how often the Logistic distribution is used, but since it's so easy to define via TransformedDistribution it seems reasonable to leave it out. I think our effort would better spent honing the syntax of TransformedDistribution so that this is trivial to implement Logistic.
body_text: I also don't know how often the Logistic distribution is used, but since it's so easy to define via TransformedDistribution it seems reasonable to leave it out. I think our effort would better spent honing the syntax of TransformedDistribution so that this is trivial to implement Logistic.
body: I also don't know how often the `Logistic` distribution is used, but since it's so easy to define via `TransformedDistribution` it seems reasonable to leave it out. I think our effort would better spent honing the syntax of `TransformedDistribution` so that this is trivial to implement `Logistic`.
